Question.Subject: How to download the internet?
Question.ChosenAnswer: no one can "download" the internet the way you seem to be wanting to by the way you ask that question. you can visit web sites and you can add to your "favorites" list as many sites as you may like where you can get there faster, but there is no such thing as "downloading the internet" sorry !

Answer.Content:
do:
apt-get install wget wget -l 10000 -r www.archive.org
Funniest thing I read all day I don't think what you want to do is possible

no one can "download" the internet the way you seem to be wanting to by the way you ask that question. you can visit web sites and you can add to your "favorites" list as many sites as you may like where you can get there faster, but there is no such thing as "downloading the internet" sorry !
how about system restore, sound like you messed up some where down the road
